subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: On Monday, The Times will introduce a weekly golf presentation dedicated to everyone who has felt the game’s distinct pull — and slice. It will include videos at nytimes.com/golf and will be written by Bill Pennington, who explains his passion for the game here.
